item.title: Kalpakkam Travel Guide (Tamil Nadu North Coast/Tamil Nadu/Southern India/India/South Asia/Asia)
item.description: Explore the culturally rich and naturally endowed town of Kalpakkam in Tamil Nadu North Coast. Find the best places to visit, stay, eat, hike, and shop. Plan your week-long itinerary with the help of our travel guide.

item.title: Fouman Travel Guide (Caspian Iran/Iran/Middle East/Asia)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit, things to do, hiking/biking routes, food and drink scene, where to stay, local culture and customs of Fouman, safety and health, transportation options, nearby destinations, and more in this comprehensive tour guide.

item.title: Plymouth Travel Guide (Western Illinois/Illinois/Midwest/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit and things to do in Plymouth, Illinois. Find out what to eat, where to stay, and how to get around in this comprehensive travel guide.

item.title: Masohi Travel Guide (Maluku/Indonesia/Southeast Asia/Asia)
item.description: Plan your trip to Masohi, Indonesia with this comprehensive travel guide. Discover the top things to do, places to visit, where to stay, what to eat, and more.

item.title: Mutoroshanga Ethel Mine Travel Guide (Mashonaland/Zimbabwe/Southern Africa/Africa)
item.description: Discover the culturally rich and natural marvels of Mutoroshanga Ethel Mine in Zimbabwe with our extensive travel guide. Explore the best places to visit, must-try dishes, where to stay, and more!

item.title: Doğubayazıt Travel Guide (Eastern Anatolia/Turkey/Middle East/Asia)
item.description: Explore the cultural and natural attractions, hiking and biking routes, food and drink scene, accommodations, local customs, safety and health, transportation options, and nearby destinations of Doğubayazıt in Eastern Turkey.

item.title: Punta Mita Travel Guide (Nayarit/Pacific Coast/Mexico/North America)
item.description: Discover the top attractions, activities, and places to stay in Punta Mita, Mexico with our comprehensive travel guide.

item.title: Pelee Island Travel Guide (Essex County/Southwestern Ontario/Ontario/Canada/North America)
item.description: Discover the best things to do in Pelee Island, from outdoor adventures and scenic views to local culture and customs, and where to stay and eat.

item.title: Manu'a Travel Guide (American Samoa/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Plan your trip to Manu'a in American Samoa with our comprehensive travel guide. Discover the best places to visit, hike and bike routes, food and drinks, accommodations, and more. Learn about local culture and customs, safety, and logistics.

item.title: Motueka Travel Guide (Nelson Bays/South Island/New Zealand/Oceania)
item.description: Discover the best attractions, activities, food, and accommodations Motueka has to offer. Get tips on transportation, safety, culture, and more with this comprehensive guide.
